summary: This document is an inventory list of materials provided for review in the Epstein case, including plea documents, police reports, diaries, affidavits, property reports, emails, legal filings, indictments, and media articles. It references a wide range of evidence and investigative materials compiled for the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the case; referenced in plea documents, diary excerpts, emails, property reports, and indictments.

persons.name: George Rush
persons.context: Conducted an interview with Jeffrey Epstein and provided affidavits dated April 6, 2010, and April 30, 2010.

persons.name: Lisa Rocchio
persons.context: Government expert whose disclosure is referenced in a government letter.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced in a deposition and in superseding indictments; co-accused in the case.

persons.name: Bill Gates
persons.context: Mentioned in a media article title regarding his hopes for Epstein's help in winning a Nobel prize.

persons.name: Woody Allen
persons.context: Mentioned in a media article title about his close friendship with Epstein.

persons.name: Graydon
persons.context: Recipient of a typed note from an unnamed sender, referenced in the evidence list.

connections.description: Both are named in legal complaints and indictments, indicating a close association in the alleged criminal activity.
Rush interviewed Epstein, as indicated by pleading excerpts and affidavits.
Media article suggests a connection where Gates hoped Epstein could help him win a Nobel prize.
Media article references a close friendship between Allen and Epstein.

events.title: PBPD Reports
events.description: Police reports from the Palm Beach Police Department referenced as evidence.

events.title: Lawsuit Filing
events.description: Summons and complaint filed in case CMA v. JE/SK.

events.title: George Rush Affidavit
events.description: First affidavit provided by George Rush.

events.title: George Rush Supplemental Affidavit
events.description: Supplemental affidavit provided by George Rush.

events.title: Maxwell Second Superseding Indictment
events.description: Second superseding indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: New York City (referenced in Property Details report)
keyFacts: The document is a comprehensive inventory of evidence and materials related to the Jeffrey Epstein case, spanning from 2005 to 2021.
It includes sensitive materials such as Epstein's plea documents, diaries, day planners, police reports, property records, and psychological evaluation notes.
Multiple legal affidavits from individuals like George Rush, Michael Fisten, and Dr. Hall are listed as evidence.
The list references major legal filings including Epstein's 2019 indictment and Ghislaine Maxwell's superseding indictments in 2020 and 2021.
Media articles and podcasts about Epstein's connections to public figures like Bill Gates and Woody Allen are included in the materials for review.
